p:
Additionally, the average value of lithium ion diffusion coefficients during charging was calculated from the GITT method
60 . The average D Li+ was 5.81 × 10 –12 cm −2 s −1, 3.88 × 10 –12 cm −2 s −1 and 3.05 × 10 –13 cm −2 s −1 for Si@PAU- g-PEG, Si@PAA- g-PEG and Si@PAA. Although there are some differences in the values from GITT compared to those from EIS, the trend was the same.
